meanings.definition: A restatement of a text or passage using different words.
meanings.sent1: She read the paraphrases of the story to the class.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to identify the paraphrases in the article.
meanings.sent3: The book of paraphrases made her laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His paraphrases of the poem painted a vivid picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The paraphrases in the textbook helped her understand the complex topic better.

meanings.definition: To restate a text or passage using different words.
meanings.sent1: He paraphrases the instructions to make them easier to follow.
meanings.sent2: She often paraphrases famous quotes to express her ideas.
meanings.sent3: The comedian paraphrases famous speeches in a hilarious way.
meanings.sent4: His ability to paraphrase complex theories is like a magic trick.
meanings.sent5: Paraphrasing the dialogue in the play made it more engaging for the audience.
